titleStmt.title: A letter from a noble-man of this kingdome, (now in armes for his King and countrey) to the Lord Say, seriously inviting him to his allegeance.
titleStmt.author: Noble-man of this kingdome.
Saye and Sele, William Fiennes, Viscount, 1582-1662.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
